response.overview: Get a look at some spectacular American Flyer S-gauge layouts with this fascinating documentary that train collectors will love. Highlights include a three-level work of art featuring suspension bridges and colorful villages; a Christmas wonderland complete with winter scenery and Plasticville buildings; and a remarkable layout with extensive accessories -- including a magnetic crane, a rotary dump and log loaders -- made from Erector set parts.
response.title: American Flyer: Parts 1 & 2
